hooks.name: format-on-edit
hooks.description: Run goimports on edited Go files (formats and fixes imports)

hooks.name: vet-on-edit
hooks.description: Run go vet after Go file edits

hooks.name: build-check-on-edit
hooks.description: Run go build to check for compilation errors

hooks.name: pre-commit-quality-gate
hooks.description: Full quality check before git commits
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then go vet ./... && go test ./...; fi
